summary: The module ingests maternal and perinatal simulation outputs, extracts key health indicators, matches them to Global Burden of Disease reference values, calculates confidence intervals, and creates bar‑chart visualizations. It also supplies helper routines to build and clean the data frames required for calibrating the simulation model.
business_intent: Enable accurate calibration of maternal and perinatal health models by comparing simulated outcomes with established reference data, thereby supporting evidence‑based health policy analysis and resource allocation.
